generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending from the foreground into the distance, with vehicles and pedestrians nearby.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, with pedestrians walking on them and bicycles parked along the right side.
- building: Several buildings are visible, including a large modern building with glass windows on the right and a brick building on the left.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalk and in the background, providing shade and greenery.
- person: Multiple people are visible walking on the sidewalk, standing near the buildings, or sitting on benches.
- motorcycle: A silver motorcycle is parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- bicycle: Numerous bicycles are parked in a row along the right side of the road, next to the building.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a "P" sign indicating parking and a "No Entry" sign on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including a streetlight pole and traffic sign poles.
- car: A Mercedes-Benz car is partially visible in the foreground, with its hood and emblem visible.
